_sText:
<fieldset>Ka_mars-v2 by -[Element]-
</fieldset>


<fieldset>This is a remake / seqeul of ka_mars-v1 made by me.

I choose to remake this now after I'v learned so much in hammer.
</fieldset>


<fieldset>This map includes;

-A timer for the door to open after 5 seconds 
-A timer to break the place narrowing it down
-Lasers acting as fences
-Proper lighting
</fieldset>


<fieldset>**Special thanks to prototstar for the skybox texture**</fieldset>


<fieldset>Story:

A team of terrorist's and counter-terrorist's seem to be abonned on some type of planet that look's like mars, they have nothing to do until they see the opisite force and deside to go at them with the only thing they got, their knives.

They wonder if their up there for a reason, or just the for someone's pure amusement. These questions will never get answered.
</fieldset>


More to come....

-Zero studioz
